text: Phillip John Kitching (born 30 September 1967) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for Harrogate Town, York Railway Institute, Selby Town and Knaresborough Town, and was on the books of Bradford City without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Lewisham Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. players Category:York Railway Institute A.F.C. players Category:Selby Town F.C. players Category:Knaresborough Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Phil Kitching
